api/classes/flutter-inapp-purchase.title: FlutterInappPurchase
api/classes/flutter-inapp-purchase.description: The main class for handling in-app purchases in Flutter applications. This class provides a comprehensive API for managing purchases on both iOS and Android platforms.

api/classes/iap-item.title: IAPItem
api/classes/iap-item.description: Represents an item available for purchase from either the Google Play Store or iOS App Store.

api/classes/purchase-item.title: PurchasedItem
api/classes/purchase-item.description: Represents an item that was purchased from either the Google Play Store or iOS App Store.

api/flutter-inapp-purchase.title: FlutterInappPurchase
api/flutter-inapp-purchase.description: The main class for handling in-app purchases across iOS and Android platforms.

api/methods/finish-transaction.title: finishTransaction
api/methods/finish-transaction.description: Completes a transaction and removes it from the queue.

api/methods/get-available-purchases.title: getAvailablePurchases
api/methods/get-available-purchases.description: Retrieves all non-consumed purchases made by the user.

api/methods/get-products.title: requestProducts
api/methods/get-products.description: Fetches product or subscription information with unified API (v2.7.0+).

api/methods/init-connection.title: initConnection
api/methods/init-connection.description: Initializes the connection to the platform's billing service.

api/methods/request-purchase.title: requestPurchase
api/methods/request-purchase.description: Initiates a purchase flow for the specified product.

api/methods/validate-receipt.title: validateReceipt
api/methods/validate-receipt.description: Validates purchase receipts with platform verification services.

api/overview.title: API Overview
api/overview.description: Flutter In-App Purchase provides a comprehensive API for managing in-app purchases across iOS and Android platforms.

api/types/error-codes.title: Error Codes
api/types/error-codes.description: Comprehensive error handling types and codes for flutterinapppurchase.

api/types/product-type.title: Product Types
api/types/product-type.description: Types and enums related to products and purchases in flutterinapppurchase.

api/types/purchase-state.title: Purchase States
api/types/purchase-state.description: Types and enums representing the state of purchases and transactions.

examples/basic-store.title: Basic Store
examples/basic-store.description: A complete example of implementing a basic in-app purchase store with consumable and non-consumable products.

examples/complete-implementation.title: Complete Implementation
examples/complete-implementation.description: A comprehensive, production-ready implementation with all best practices for a robust in-app purchase system.

examples/subscription-store.title: Subscription Store
examples/subscription-store.description: A complete subscription store implementation with monthly and yearly plans.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Common questions and answers about flutterinapppurchase.

getting-started/android-setup.title: Android Setup
getting-started/android-setup.description: Complete guide to configure flutterinapppurchase for Android with Google Play Billing Client v8.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation & Setup
getting-started/installation.description: Learn how to install and configure flutterinapppurchase in your Flutter project.

getting-started/ios-setup.title: iOS Setup
getting-started/ios-setup.description: Complete guide to configure flutterinapppurchase for iOS with StoreKit 2 support.

getting-started/quickstart.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quickstart.description: Get up and running with Flutter In-App Purchase in minutes.

getting-started/setup-android.title: Android Setup
getting-started/setup-android.description: This guide covers the complete setup process for implementing in-app purchases on Android.

getting-started/setup-ios.title: iOS Setup
getting-started/setup-ios.description: This guide covers the complete setup process for implementing in-app purchases on iOS.

guides/basic-setup.title: Basic Setup Guide
guides/basic-setup.description: Learn the fundamentals of setting up in-app purchases with flutterinapppurchase.

guides/error-handling.title: Error Handling
guides/error-handling.description: Comprehensive guide to handling errors in flutterinapppurchase for robust and user-friendly applications.

guides/products.title: Working with Products
guides/products.description: This guide covers how to implement and manage one-time purchase products (consumables and non-consumables).

guides/purchases.title: Purchases
guides/purchases.description: Complete guide to implementing one-time purchases (consumable and non-consumable) in your Flutter app.

guides/receipt-validation.title: Receipt Validation
guides/receipt-validation.description: Comprehensive guide to validating purchase receipts for security and fraud prevention.

guides/subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
guides/subscriptions.description: Complete guide to implementing subscription-based purchases in your Flutter app.

guides/testing.title: Testing
guides/testing.description: Comprehensive guide to testing in-app purchases during development and before release.

intro.title: flutter_inapp_purchase
intro.description: A comprehensive Flutter plugin for implementing in-app purchases on iOS and Android platforms.

migration/from-expo-iap.title: Migration from expo-iap
migration/from-expo-iap.description: This guide helps you migrate from expo-iap to flutterinapppurchase, highlighting key differences and providing migration strategies.

migration/from-v5.title: Migration from v5.x to v6.0
migration/from-v5.description: This guide helps you migrate your existing flutterinapppurchase v5.x implementation to the new 6.0.0 release with StoreKit 2 and Billing Client v8 support.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Common issues and solutions when implementing in-app purchases with flutterinapppurchase.
